Deprecated.
Projects should not be set as main by default.

setTargetFolder(WizardDescriptor, FileObject) - Static method in class org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.templates.support.Templates
Stores a target folder so that it can be remembered later using Templates.getTargetFolder(org.openide.WizardDescriptor).
